name: tbondois/php-debug
description: PHP debug libraries (dumpers...) for common needs. should not be installed in production or use IP restriction feature.

suggest.maximebf/debugbar: A generic PHP Debug toolbar monitoring errors and exception, sql queries, ajax etc
suggest.symfony/debug: Allow you to easily catch PHP errors, uncaught exceptions, class loader errors and display them nicely
suggest.symfony/dotenv: An easy way to manage IP restriction for debug features, in sensitive environments
